mapper.select: select "subscriptionId","customerId","isSubscription", "remainingCouponCount" from public."customerPickCoupon" where "customerId"='a6a48528-9215-4fb9-9dd0-5bb174103277' and "remainingCouponCount" > 0 order by "subscriptionId"
mapper.update: UPDATE public."customerPickCoupon" SET "remainingCouponCount" = "remainingCouponCount" - 1 WHERE "subscriptionId" = cast(#{subscriptionId} as UUID)
